text.section: The commission shall meet and take actions consistent with this compact and the by-laws.

Each member of the commission shall have the right and power to cast a vote to which that compacting state is entitled and to participate in the business and affairs of the commission. A member shall vote in person or by other means as provided in the by-laws. The by-laws may provide for membersâ€™ participation in meetings by telephone or other means of communication.
The commission shall meet at least once during each calendar year. Additional meetings shall be held as set forth in the by-laws.
